eu_initiatives:
TEN-T programmes and related policies and legislative files 
 
General, EFRD and Cohesion fund calls for proposals for studies and actions
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
IPL are developers and operators of Inand Ports in South East Europe. 
 
We are currenly developing a dry port in Romania
relevant_communication:
IPL (Inland Ports and Logistics ltd) are interested in EU programmes/initiatives that help to better unlock Romania for international transports and through this enhance the competitiveness of the Romanian economy (and this will help the economic development of the country).  
 
For that reason IPL follows the TEN-T initiatives on the development of freight transport corridors in Europe, mainly the, Rhine Danube Corridor, (for sea, inland waterways and rail) but also the Orient East - med corridor.  
 
IPL are also interested in policies that help develop Pan European corridor IX (which is non TEN-T)   
 
we are also interested in EU funding possibilities for private investments, mainly as the Romanian government prefers to only help public infrastructures while terminals really are also where public infrastructure and privately developed services meet. We firmly believe these developments are better done by private parties that will offer services open to all users.
